title: durithapaham anisam
sahitya:
duritApaham anisham jagadIsham kalayE hrdayE shrI shabarIsham

anupallavi

 haritAbhOnnata giri taTa nilayam harihara tanayam varadam sadayam

caraNam

 kAntAmrtakara vadanam vIram kAruNyAkaram ajaram udAram 
shAntAkAram nigama vihAram shAstAram vana tulasI hAram
